subtopics.specific_topic: Identifying the main ideas of the passage
subtopics.description: Identify the central theme or main idea of a passage, focusing on the primary argument or message conveyed by the text.
Identify and understand supporting details, facts, and examples that reinforce the main ideas in a passage.
Draw logical conclusions from the passage based on information that is implied rather than directly stated.
Analyze the organization and structure of a passage, understanding how each part of the text contributes to the overall argument.

subtopics.specific_topic: Evaluating logic and reasoning in the passage
subtopics.description: Evaluate the reasoning behind arguments and ideas presented in the passage, assessing the validity and effectiveness of the logic used.
